description: Saturday to Wednesday from 10 to 4 PM, every 30 mins.
name: Next House Tours

description: Thinking McCormick but unsure what that will entail? Come check out our wonderful facilities, from our lit Game Room to our lovely Dance Studio to our beautiful Penthouses & more! Tours are every fifteen minutes, Monday (8/27) from 1:30pm-2:30pm; Tuesday (8/28) from 10:00am-11:30am; and Wednesday (8/29) from 10:00am-11:30am.
name: Tour McCormick Hall

description: Howdy there! Come join us out in the Wild West East Campus! Come enjoy a burger, some construction, and a nice chitchat.
name: Grill and chill and build

description: power tools! ladders! safety! no experience required, burgers provided
name: Grill and chill and build

description: "Novel Idea, Go Hang Tonight!"
name: Night at the Sponge

description: Hey kid, you ever used a chop saw before? No? Excellent.
name: Grill and chill and build

description: "Assemble Together!"
name: Night at the Sponge

description: power tools! ladders! safety! no experience required, burgers provided
name: Grill and chill and build

description: "Tonight Have Entertainment!"
name: Night at the Sponge

description: From far away it looks like a lawless desert. From close up you can see the wooden settlement rising from the ground. Dye your hair, eat a burger, and venture into the bold individualism of the good ol' Wild West East Campus frontier.
name: Grill and chill and build

description: Come tour an architectural masterpiece and our awesome home! Tours begin by request at Simmons front desk, lasting 30-40 minutes. Available from noon - 6pm, Friday through Tuesday.
name: Tour the Sponge

description: Socializing People. Our Nightly Great Event!
name: Night at the Sponge

description: Watch Queer Eye with Burton 2's alpha gays and their allies.
name: B2 has a Queer Eye

description: We're watching the moat to make sure it doesn't run away.
name: Watch the Moat

description: Come eat snacks and paint things!
name: Watercolors!

description: "We will have breakfast food. Enough said."
name: Breakfast

description: Get ready to have a gay ol' time at Next House for breakfast! Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender, or queer in any way? Let's Get Breakfast Together! Bring your friends, bring your partners, and meet some of the LGBT+ community at Next House as we serve all your breakfast favorites. We even have pride flag cookies, which are totally breakfast food. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
name: Sleeping In is Gay Culture

description: Finish your FPOPs and start REX with a "balanced" breakfast!
name: Waffle Bar

description:
"Interested in living in MacGregor? Want to see where you would be living? Let us show you around!

Tours are at 10:00, 10:15, 10:30, and 10:45. Tours are running from Saturday to Tuesday. They are about 15 minutes each."
name: MacGregor Tours

description: "La Casa welcomes you to your New Home! Join us for popcorn, popsicles, and poppin music as you settle in. Meet some of the coolest cats (not actual cats but still cool) in all of New House and celebrate our fearless ex-dictator's birthday."
name: Welcome (to your New) Home

description: Come eat some delicious liquid nitrogen ice cream!
name: Fire & Ice Part 1

description: "We grill, you fill, we all chill. Veg* options available."
name: Grill, Fill, Chill

description: The fort is almost built, the bridge is almost bridging, but now there are so many outdoor murals to be painted!
name: Grill, Chill, Build, now featuring art!

description: If you're worried about what your parents will think, natural colors such as leaf green, sky blue, and grape purple also available.
name: Brand Yourself (hair dye/henna)

description: Do you yearn to push the limits of culinary experimentation beyond the conventionally accepted or the reasonable? Do people call your creations "interesting," "bold," or "dumb"? No longer! Come to Random Hall to do Science! Except edible! Think potato caramel, popcorn cake, and "good" rice cookies.
name: Experimental Cooking

description: Come play (almost) life-sized Settlers of Catan! Hoard (and eat, when it's not your turn) marshmallow "sheep", pretzel "wheat", oreo "iron", and graham cracker "bricks"! Trade them with your neighbors, or foil their plans and keep everything to yourself. Build roads, villages, and cities!
name: Life-Sized Settlers of Catan

description: "What is frilled cheese? A classic, beloafed foodstuff in a variant spelling? A surreal marriage of crochet and dairy? Satirical art that indicts culinary ornateness and excess? Discover or debate the answer, hang out with the residents, and stuff your face with copious, overburdened frilled cheese. For the curious, gluten-free and dairy-free options will be available"
name: Frilled Cheese

description: Come play this fun hide-and-seek variant inside Next House! No assembly or prior experience necessary.
name: Sardines

description: Make candy sushi!
name: B5ushi

description: "When was the last time you played Pac-man? When was the last time you played a Pacman in real life? Waka Waka"
name: Dining Hall Pacman

description: "Enjoy a fun game of soccer with the Alpha Dogs! Or just stop by and grab some nice, cold popsicles."
name: Soccer and Popsicles with A-Dogs

description: Come help us find the best chocolate chip cookie recipe by baking and eating them all!
name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Optimization

description: If you haven't been introduced to Toscanini's B^3 (brown butter, brown sugar, and brownies) ice cream yet, you will be soon, never fear. But in the mean time, experience something exponentially greater: B^N. Ice cream can only be better with more toppings that start with B, right? Brownies, bananas, berries, basil, brie, broccoli, beef, blood...
name: B^N

description: Here at Next House, we have a group of Nexties that like to construct things that are BIG. For REX, we're handing our tools over to you... cardboard and duct tape. Come on down to the Next House Courtyard to make the biggest and best cardboard fort you can! But beware... the inspectors are about. And if your towers aren't up to safety regulations...!
name: Next Big Thing: Cardboard City

description: WATT could be more fun than soldering your own circuit with Next Make? (Disclaimer: family members who would like to attend must be accompanied by their child)
name: Next Make: Make Your Own Circuit Board!

description: Come for snacks and learn about community service opportunities at MIT!
name: How To: Get Involved!

description: Come join us in the best tea party of your life in the Burton 3rd dollhouse.
name: Tea Party

description: Make that cuddly Eldritch Horror friend you've always wanted! Rend some plushies asunder and re-form them in your own image! A dog head here, some bat wings there, a lizard tail to pull the whole thing together and ta da! Perfection.
name: Lovecrafting

description: "There will be an ice cream truck! There will be silly string! Let's have some fun!"
name: Ice Cream and Silly String

description: "Do you love cinnamon rolls! So do we! Roll up to our event and custom design your own roll with frosting, fruit, nuts, and more!"
name: Cinnamon Roll Decorating

description: "Come cook with us! Play the smash hit video game, or, try your hand at a real life version… minus the fires. We'll only judge you on how well you can work together."
name: Overcooked

description: Come get your financial priorities straight with Destiny's rocket team members while exploring the two primary uses of our kitchen table.
name: Rockets and Ramen

description: Come play everyone's favorite group bonding party game with your Next House friendos and fellow first years! Get to know and laugh at each other, and develop strange inside jokes in the process!
name: Jackbox Games

description: "Are you worried about how you'll survive MIT without your mom making you dinner? Does the idea of dining hall food make you cry inside? Have you had this weird idea for mac and cheese you've always wanted to try? Come to H Entry and learn how to cook, dorm style, from the people who know best. "
name: Creative Cooking with H Entry

description: "1 giant inflatable soccer ball, 1 soccer field, and a ton of future friends having fun."
name: Inflatable Soccer!!!

description: Homemade pizza and cookie dough. ~quirky~ toppings. big data.
name: bONE app the teeth

description: Play great Jackbox party games like Drawful, Fibbage, and Trivia Murder Party and eat pizza with the babes of BMF!
name: Jackbox Power Hour

description: Join a dramatic reading of Birdland, an interactive story game about gay summer campers and also birds!
name: Birdland

description: "No, not the building, silly! We have 9 different cooking & social communities: come see what they made just for you!!"
name: Taste New House!

description: Welcome to the International House Of dinner (not to be confused with the IHOp or IHOb). Learn how to cook Asian cuisine, or stop by for some Mexican street corn! Out here in the Wild East campus, who knows what other foods you might encounter? You'll just have to come and find out!
name: International House Of dinner (IHOd)

description: WAFFLE EVERYTHING!
name: B5 Waffle Everything

description: We got BBQ, buffalo, and way too spicy. See if you can handle the spiciest wings on both sides of the Mississippi.
name: Hot Wings and Chill

description: "There can only be one college meal to rise above the others, and we need you to decide."
name: Mac&Cheese vs. Ramen

description: "Come and have fun with miracle berries, berries that affect your taste buds and makes sour things taste sweet! Try it out with some lemonade, sour war heads, assorted fruits, and cookies (because why not.)"
name: Come Flip Your Taste Buds

description: "Make your way through the most puzzling of MIT’s dorms to become the first team to find the hidden Coin! This exciting hunt is a fast-paced combination of math, shape, and word puzzles involving a Simmons-wide search for clues. Arrive early, as a limited number of teams will be able to participate."
name: Sponge Scavenger Hunt

description: Make Bowls out of Fruit. Fill Fruit Bowls with Fruit. Move Fruit from Fruit Fruit-Bowls to your mouth (not yet Fruit). Fight Scurvy. Potentials side effects include bad fruit puns.
name: FruitBowl

description: Come to B5 to play some extremely fun and intriguing games of secret hitler (a social deduction board game that puts games like Avalon, the resistance, werewolf, mafia, etc. to shame). Will you be able to help find and stop the Secret Hitler or merely aid in his ascent to power?
name: Social Deduction 101

description: I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream! Served steaming cold.
name: LN2 Ice Cream

description: "Fight for your team, impress the crowds, gain the attention of pro scooter hockey coaches for the upcoming season, and win glory beyond your wildest dreams. In short, get on a scooter and play some hockey."
name: SCOOTAH HOCKEY

description: Come join McCormick Hall for our first event of the school year! We will have so many different types of desserts from pies to cannolis to baklava to you name it. Not to mention the fact that we will be able to enjoy these desserts while watching a broadway classical! It’s a pretty good bad idea; dessert and you.
name: Sugar. Butter. Flour.

description: "Video games and pancakes, what more can we say? "
name: Overcooked and Over cooking

description: Watch movies/TV shows while consuming various sugary desserts, including Asian-styled shaved ice with traditional toppings and ice cream. Chill out and brace yourself for the upcoming stampede of orientation/REX events.
name: Netflix and Chill

description: Embrace your inner weeb!
name: Anime Watch Party

description: Watch the best movie of all time and eat ramen with me, the ramen girl
name: Ramen and Ramen Girl

description: Protect your Secret Hitler, Connect words with their Codenames, or play your favorite Card Against Humanity!
name: Board Games

description: "What better way to spend one of your first nights new in town than watching John Mulaney's comedy specials?  If we make brownies, you’ll have a couple, right? If we make brownies for the REX event, you’ll have?— I know you’ll have brownies if I make brownies?—?should we do it? Yeah, let’s be bad!  C’mon, let’s do it!  We’re gonna make a plate of brownies!"
name: mulanEy and browniEs

description: "Smash 4? MELEE? Brawl? (Just kidding about that last one.) Come fight your fellow frosh and Simmons' best while munching on some great late-night snacks."
name: Smash Bros

description: "Join House 2 for movies, snacks, and hanging out with some the coolest people at the end of Memorial Drive."
name: Movie Night!!!!!

description: Come learn about life at BC and MIT while enjoying ice cream sundaes and playing Smash!
name: B5ocial

description: whom’st’ve ¯\_(?)_/¯
name: Bomber Guess Who

description:
I look deep into my heart. I see only darkness. I look into the darkness. I see only despair. Not very well though.
Because of the darkness.
name: Angst and Appetizers

description: "Come get your fill of chicken (nuggets) and waffles while playing Super Smash Bros and listening to Dubstep. Sounds like a great night."
name: Wub Wub & Waffles

description: Quell peasant revolts, marry the institution of marriage itself (thereby preventing anyone else from getting married again, EVER), learn about the Reverse Romanian Wilkinson, and break the fabric of reality as you attempt to court various monsters and get them to go to prom with you in the hit video game Monster Prom!
name: Monster Prom

description: Bring your smartphone, bad doodling skills, and a sense of humor to Burton 2. If you aren't laughing your ass off by the end of this event, we'll refund all three.
name: B2 Jackbox Games

description: Ready to relax and binge some anime! Come join Clam for some excellent binges!
name: Anime Binge on Clam

description: "Because we all know we want to. We have cheesecake. You like cheesecake. Come get cheesecake. We also have Sporcle. Come and sporcle. (Sporcle is a group trivia game which we will be projecting on to the big screen - if you know about anything from obscure sports records to crystology, come and yell at our typists!)"
name: Cheesecake & Sporcle

description: Where’s “here” *thinking emoji*
name: we're not here

description: A C4 Tradition.
name: Crosswords and Sporcle

description: Catch some delicious pancakes in the Country Kitchen! Chill and talk to Nexties! Warm up by roasting s’mores in the courtyard!
name: Midnight Pancakes & Smores

description: PANCAKES PANCAKES PANCAKES PANCAKES PANCAKES
name: Random House of Pancakes

description: "We will have breakfast food. Enough said."
name: Breakfast

description: "Our dorm may look like a waffle, but we are pancake-afficionados at heart. "
name: Pancake Breakfast

description: SUNDAY SUNDAY SUNDAY GET READY FRESHMAN FOR THE BIGGEST BREAKFAST ON CAMPUS WHERE FAN FAVORITES SUCH AS SIR PANCAKE MCCHOCOLATECHIP MAKES A RETURN AND BATTLES THE CURRENT CHAMPION: MR SLOPPILY MADE CINNAMON ROLL but please don't make a mess, we're trying to be civilized here for gosh darndest sake
name: Actually Gourmet Breakfast

description: Good morning! Explore campus/Cambridge while burning off all of those rush burger calories on 30 to 60 minute jog.
name: Morning Run

description: Whether because you missed your ASE (don't worry, it happens to many of us) or to prepare for the rest of the fun events at REX, enjoy some nice breakfast pancakes! Typical condiments + toppings provided.
name: Slept through your ASE?

description: IHOP may have changed its name to IHOb, but why brunch there when you could come to IHOb1, the international house of burton 1? There will be pancakes (like, so many pancakes and toppings and stuff). There will be burgers!!! there will be burton 1 residents (but you can't eat them, sorry)!!!!
name: IHOB1

description: "Thousands of years ago, Greek Soldiers infiltrated Troy through use of an ingenious "Trojan Horse" but little does history know, that it was in actuality a duck. We have the infamous base of that "horse" at our disposal to work with."
name: Trojan Duck Build

description: Do people live here? Find a friendly cowboi tourguide in the courtyard for an East Campus dorm tour! Leaves approximately every half hour on 8/26 from 10 AM - 12 PM.
name: EC Dorm Tours

description: Build a marble course, threading all throughout every corner of Next House! Cheer on your favorite, most special marble! Try not to lose any of them in the process :))
name: Marble Run

description: Come see if Conner 3 can do milkshakes better than Mickey D's!
name: Shamrock Shakes!

description: Math isn't all about holomorphic homomorphisms. Some of it is fun stuff you can learn over tea and cookies. Come on down for refreshments and fun math problems.
name: Math and Tea

description: Is your current hair color too boring and natural? Then come and dye it any or all of the colors of the rainbow. (Feel free to come in at any time during the event.)
name: Hair to Dye For

description:
"Burgers, kebabs, and shakes served throughout (Vegetarian/vegan friendly). Flaming Chickens served on every hour (1 - 4 PM)! 12:30 PM sharp: watch the pig enter our roaster ~5:00 PM: pig’s ready to eat!

Come join MacGregor’s Fire Hazards for food, friends, and flames! Prepare to roast your own hamburgers, kebabs, and (new) friends this wonderful Sunday afternoon in MacGregor’s courtyard. "
name: Fire Hazard Roast

description: "Come enjoy some free lunch by making your own bagel pizza with delectable toppings. You should probably eat said pizza bagels as well."
name: Pizza Bagels

description: "Come stencil stuff on FREE T-SHIRTS! Create your own tech wear, or gear up for the water war. "
name: Tshirt & Stencils

description: burgers, wood, safety cones, oOO SQUIRREL .. just kidding that's just some upperclassmen running on a human-sized hampster wheel. Need something to preoccupy your boundless excitement/attention? help put finishing touches on construction projects and art murals, or chill and chat in our fort saloon!
name: Grill, Chill, Build, and courtyard shenanigans

description: Exercise your freedom of expression by dying your hair ALL OF THE COLORS and henna tattooing ALL OF YOUR BODY.
name: Brand Yourself (hair dye/henna)

description: Travel to Morzack’s Institute of Thaumaturgy — the finest adventuring academy in all the land! We welcome everyone, from first ­time sorcerers to experienced paladins. Roll dice, meet friends, and team up with your fellow adventurers to survive the entrance exam of a lifetime!
name: Next Quest: Dungeons & Dragons

description: Come learn how to meditate from us! Learn how to destress when MIT becomes too hectic!
name: MedItaTion

description: English tea time! Enjoy some jam and brie grilled cheese and more :)
name: Elevensies

description: Join the gentry of G-Entry in paying tribute to the greatest games ever made: Super Smash Brothers Melee and Mario Kart Double Dash! There will be snacks for everyone and an awesome prize for anyone who can beat one of our top smashers one on one! No dash backs allowed ;)
name: Smash 'n Dash

description: You're familiar with the Summer Olympics, and you know all about the Winter Olympics, but have you heard of the Spring Olympics? This year, they are being held in Random Hall. Come compete in the Clam Olympics and attempt to bring home a medal! We're totally licensed by the IOC.
name: Clam Olympics

description: Lava? Student Loans? Studying for your ASE? Who cares? Just avoid it.
name: The Floor is [Insert Thing Here]

description: You can't legally drink, but you can pretend like you can with some of these flavorful creations!
name: Mocktails

description: Face your new peers! Do you remember everything from all those classes in high school?
name: Trivia!

description: "Join the Master Chefs of House 2 to whip up a gourmet meal on a student budget. We'll have pasta, cereal, and other high quality ingredients that would make even Gordon Ramsay proud (of our 'creativity')."
name: Top Chef: College Edition

description: "remember gym class in elementary school? like that but better. featuring snakes in the grass, sharks and minnows, rocket whips, and whatever else you can imagine"
name: Butt Scooters

description: Like hungry, hungry hippos except you're the hippo.
name: Life Size Hungry Hungry Hippos

description: Rage, rage against the tech uprising.
name: Rage Against the Machines

description: Want to learn about the life of a biology major at MIT? Want to eat brownies? Hear about cool research students are doing on campus? Eat brownies? Know if organic chemistry really is /that/ bad? Brownies? Geek out about biology? Brownies? Brownies! (Brownies will be served.)
name: Biology and Brownies

description: "Come paint the afternoon away with us! We'll have all the colors of the rainbow, enough paint brushes to go around, and friendly conversation over juice and soda."
name: Paint Bar

description: whohastimeforspaceswhenyouonlyhaveminutestoexplore10halls? (dorm tour - the ~quick~ version on 8/26 from 1:30 PM - 2:30 PM)
name: ecrunningtours

description: "Come meet Bailey the Therapy Dog that comes and visits MIT occassionally throughout the year. "
name: Bow Wow Wow It's Bailey

description: "Come game and bond with us! Loser has to smell stinky socks! From board games to trivia to racing with banana peels on the track, we've turned every game you can think of into a a high stakes battle to avoid nasty dares. Don't worry though, we're pretty bad at games too."
name: Arcade and Consequences

description: "Join DH as we venture out to Toscanini's and enjoy the Best Ice Cream in Boston!!"
name: Ice Cream Field Trip

description: We've raided Costco so we’ve got tons of fruit and yogurt! Come grab a smoothie to get you through the day.
name: Smoothies On The Lawn

description: How much you can stretch a mozzarella stick? Can you beat the record of 35 inches? Reward: 35+ inch mozzarella stick
name: Mozzarella Stick Stretching Contest

description: Pour up. Drank. Upsmash. Drank. Sit down. Drank. Upsmash. Drank.
name: The Arizona Smash Challenge

description: Help us settle this raging scientific controversy with a good ol' water balloon dodgeball match!
name: Water is Wet/Not Wet?

description: Learn to spin balls on strings around your head without hitting yourself! Come hang out on our lovely roofdeck and learn the basics of the ancient art of Poi!
name: Spinning on the Roofdeck

description: In Hogsmeade you can find all sorts of fantastic treats! Come through Random Hall's very own portal to the magical town to enjoy some of their snacks and watch one of the documentaries about the events leading up to the Second Wizarding War.
name: Random Hallsmeade

description: Burgers, Games, Music. Enjoy the summer weather before it goes away!
name: Yard Games

description: Party with your tastebuds as you enjoy warm crêpes with flavorful depth. Nutella, strawberries, whipped cream galore. Prosciutto, spinach, and even more! Savory or sweet - you're in for a real treat!
name: Fête de Crêpes

description: Jackbox Games 3 cancelled by E
name: Jackbox Games 2 (feat. Luis Fonsi)

description: Come watch Paul Hollywood and Merry Berry judge a bunch of British people, then recreate the desserts yourself!
name: British Baking Show and Actual Baking

description: Popsicles? Gooooooood. Watching people walk past Burton Conner? Goooooooooood.
name: Popsicles and People Watching

description: The thrilling new movie script, told for the first time. Come hang out and eat some snacks!
name: Axis 4

description: come help me find my wallet in what will be a treasure hunt the likes of which you’ve never encountered before. a grueling series of puzzles. at the cost of finding my wallet, what will you lose? your patience? your appetite? your wallet? lose yourself to dance?
name: help I lost my wallet

description: Listen to the finest Viking romance novels and eat delicious warm chocolate chip cookies. Feel the horriblehorriblehorrible sensation of rivulets of chocolate dripping down your throat and discover Thor's magnificent hammer!
name: Cookies and Smut

description: "Rated 2 spoopy 5 you by our top scientists. Come combine two of your favorite childhood games in one of the most architectually confusing buildings known to mankind."
name: Capture the Sardines

description: "Stop by and meet the Alpha Dogs while enjoying some Chipotle Burritos!"
name: Rolling with the Alpha Dogs

description: We decided to change our name to IHOb... the b stands for (rush) burgers of course
name: IHOb

description: Literally just a huge pool of non-newtonian fluid.
name: oob1eck

description: Burton 2 loves bobaaaaaaa! Share our love of boba (and milk tea, of course).
name: BOBA???

description: Come join us for some comfort food everyone loves - grilled cheese and tomato soup!
name: Classic Comforts

description: Come take play Sprocle with other students on topics of your choice!
name: Sporcle!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

description: Come enjoy Random Hall’s first ever Rooftop Festival of Crickets! Get your own roster of crickets just by stopping by, then compete with your own crickets against others in cricket controlled Bug Racers®, cricket-sized mazes, and more! Win your cricket prizes!
name: The Rooftop Festival of Crickets

description: "We have a lot of pancakes and pancake breakfasts, but we need some new flavors. Come play WILL IT PANCAKE!"
name: Pancake Mystery Maker

description: "Congratulations! You’ve successfully unlocked a new chapter: ‘College’. But before you start, do you have any goals you want to achieve throughout this journey? Are you wondering how much your thoughts may change in a year? Come and write a letter to your future self! Letters will be mailed at the end of freshman year before summer."
name: Write a Letter to Your Future Self & Origami

description: "we've moved back from all the way across the river! help us warm our new house and make it our home. tasteful housewarming food provided"
name: Housewarming Party

description: Come to our \LaTex seminar to learn how to use \LaTex to make beautifully typeset documents and wow your teachers. Or cum to our latex seminar for phallic fruits/veggies, endless condoms, and a taste of sex positivity. Or both! Feel free to bring all of your safe sex questions, \LaTex pedantic-ness, or both!
name: LaTex seminar/Flavorful fellatio (ie latex seminar)

description: Do you like to paint? Come enjoy some snacks, meet some BC residents, and make your own masterpiece to hang up in your new room!
name: Be Art5y

description: "Do you have what it takes for war? Find out at MacGregor, as we battle in laser tag."
name: Laser Tag

description: "A classic spagetti dinner where you get to make your own dinner with choices of pasta, sauces, meats, veggies, and cheeses. Gluten free pasta will be available."
name: Simmons Spaghetti Night

description: "tfw you're too bourgeois for microwave popcorn"
name: French Movie Night

description: Come hear about computer science research, projects, topics, and oddities. Drink juice while you learn. It's CS and Juice.
name: CS and Juice

description: Learn your way around campus, make some friends, and get in on some friendly competition!
notes_to_dormcon: This event involves participants going around campus, with Maseeh as a base.
name: Scavenger Hunt

description: "Is Orientation at the good old 'Tute wearing you out? Never fear! House 2 has the best low-tech entertainment and snacks on campus to unwind and make new friends."
name: Board Games Extravaganza

description: Are you looking for a way to ignite your REX? Or perhaps you've bit off a more than you could chew, and you're looking for a way to cool down? Whichever the case, we have the medicine for your ailment! Come enjoy a mix of ludicrously spicy and frighteningly chilled foods with Next House 3E!
name: 3E: Second and a Half Inaugural Biannual Fire and Ice Hunger Games (SHIBFIHG)

description: "COME CELEBRATE THE ULTIMATE SIMMONS EXPERIENCE: Miracle Berries * Butterfly Combs * Cheese * Paper Airplane Resume Transformations * Cotton Candy! * GATAS * Henna * Inverse Curling * Chalking * Cupcake Roulette *SWAGFEST * PLUS MORE!"
notes_to_dormcon: Put this event before individual SIMFEST events please!
name: SIMFEST!

description: Amino acids are the building blocks of proteins. The mitochondria is the powerhouse of the cell. This is not a biology-related event. We literally have blocks to build with.
name: SIMFEST: Building Blocks

description: Good with your hands? Want to dazzle your friends with some new moves? Come learn some basic openings and closings with a butterfly comb, taught by our resident butterfly comb enthusiast. If you ask nicely, she'll even show you some of her best tricks!
name: SIMFEST: Butterfly Combs

description: There is cheese.
name: SIMFEST: Cheese

description: We only have one. We're not Random.
name: SIMFEST: Come Try Our Massage Chair

description: There's nothing tastier than sugar clouds.
name: SIMFEST: Cotton Candy

description: Before you are many cupcakes, some are delectable, while some are not so delectable. How daring are you?
name: SIMFEST: Cupcake Roulette

description: We have belgian waffle makers, and belgian waffle toppings. You have cooking ability. Right?
name: SIMFEST: Eat Waffles

description: "Objectively the best use of any pool table- a fast-paced billiards game that is a long-standing Simmons tradition!"
name: SIMFEST: GATAS

description: People always say there are ___ windows IN Simmons, but aren't they actually ON Simmons? Come take a guess at the number of windows in/on/upon our very holey dorm.
name: SIMFEST: Guess the Number of Windows upon Simmons

description: Your first day of college? Get a tattoo! A temporary one of course – but your folks don't have to know that.
name: SIMFEST: Henna

description: I'm sure you know how curling is a block of rock on a ice. But here, it is a block of ice on rock. Come see how it works.
name: SIMFEST: Inverse Curling

description: Experience the magic of miracle berries and take your taste buds on a ride! How can vinegar taste so good? Why is everything sweeter? Come try it for yourself!
name: SIMFEST: Miracle Berries

description: Here at MIT, there are a lot of resumes that are made and used for career fair. We need a fun way to transform these overly formal documents.
name: SIMFEST: Paper Airplane Resume Transformations

description: A collaborative art project inspired by r/Place (Reddit's 2017 April Fools event)
name: SIMFEST: r/Place IRL

description: Come see us take our shirts off (no nudity), in an extreme fashion! There will be prizes!
name: SIMFEST: Shirts Off Challenge Extreme Edition

description: I slime, you slime, he/she slime, we slime, they slime. Also, slime is spelled with the same letters as smile! Come slime (and smile) with us!
name: SIMFEST: Slime Making

description: Find elusive upperclassmen scattered all around Simmons during SimFEST! There will be prizes(?)!
name: SIMFEST: Swagfest

description: Hazards include wounded pride and sick burns.
name: SIMFEST: Trash Talk over Rock Paper Scissors

description: "We're gonna paint/draw while listening to Frank Ocean. Don't worry, it's still art if your tears fall on the paper."
name: Paint Both Sides like Chanel

description: breaking down barriers, one wall at a time
name: Wall of Achievements

description: Come to the Wild-West East Side Party, where the beat of the bass never dies. Kick off the party by breaking down the Wall of Achievements, cross a bridge, bob for boba, get space trained, and wrestle in substances never before wrestled in. And as you dance in the smoke, the interactive lights display, the thumping dreamscape of an unstoppable party, you too will taste the sweet nectar of freedom.
name: East Side Party

description: Join 3W residents to feel what it's like to live in the SafetyThird family. There will be Bay-Snax, spontaneous singalongs, videogames like Mario Kart + Smash, board games, and more! See where you line up on ridiculous alignment charts. Come discover why here safety is third...we promise there are absolutely NO nerf guns hidden underneath our giant Baymax.
name: 3W: SafetyThird Starter Pack

description: Paint in a nontrivial number of shades of blue (ultramarine, b1 b1ue, maybe not cyan because it's ugly, Tiffany blue, eggshell blue, cobalt, prussian blue, indigo, sky blue, royal blue, electric blue, azure, cerulean blue, even some spicy warm blue, navy etc), with which you can paint canvases or things--literally anything.
name: Everything is B1ue

description: Jackbox Games until your gut hurts from laughing.
name: Party Games With People Who Don't Party

description: Come relax with us, enjoy hot chocolate and s'more's, and help us add to our planetarium.
name: Hot Chocolate, S'mores and the Galaxy

description: Come join Burton third as we find out the true value of a Klondike bar.(Through the use of the official klondike bar game of course! Only the highest forms of entertainment allowed!)
name: What would you do for a Klondike bar?

description: Free food is everywhere! Events! Meals! Desserts! But...what happens when REX...ends? Come cook with us and learn all the ways to feed yourself at MIT!
name: How to Not Starve

description: Come yell Rocky style callouts at Neil Patrick Harris, Nathan Fillion, and Felicia Day while watching this quirky comedy.
name: Rocky Horrible’s Sing-Along Blog

description: Didn't win yesterday? It's rematch time!
name: Board Games

description: "You know you want to campFYRE into MacGregor.  Come and hang out with us in J Entry (up the outdoor stairs to the right) to learn about MacG and J Entry in particular.  This relaxed event with blanket tents, s'mores, and a virtual fireplace is the perfect place to ask whatever questions you have!"
name: "The Original (J Entry) Indoor Camping, est. 2018"

description: You’ve got the tube. You’ve got the ID. But do you have the insider details on all things MIT? This fast-paced game will test your knowledge on MIT culture and by the end of the night, we’ll crown the next Spiciest Memelord.
name: Trivia Night

description: How good are you with your chopsticks? what about your potatoboat? Come bob for boba using random kitchen utensils, and then enjoy some boba tea (using a specific kitchenware, namely a cup).
name: Boba Balls

description: Burton 2 has hundreds of Steam games, and we need help playing them. Complete with Doritos and Mountain Dew.
name: B2 Game Knight

description: art
name: Deep Talks with Shallow People

description: Texas hold'em and Chinese food at MacGregor. Eat food while playing poker with your new classmates. No money involved.
name: Chinese and Poker

description: Challenge your friends and meet new ones playing our 60+ board and card games… Or come play some awesome couch co-op and couch-competitive video games! We’ll have plenty of snacks, drinks, and fun– including delicious milkshakes!
name: Next Gamers: Board Games, Co-Op Video Games, and Milkshakes!

description: Ever wondered what an exquisite corpse looks like? Or how to sound pretentious at parties? Wonder no more!
name: Surrealist Party Games

description: "Come hang out with D-Entry and play games like cards against humanity, exploding kittens, Katan, Smash or just come and chill. There’ll be pizza and wings."
name: Game Night with D-Entry

description: "Want to know how students deal with pset deadlines? What to do if your roommate wants the room to themselves for the night? The meaning of life? Come and ask any question you want, anonymously, to our diverse panel of residents. They have sworn to tell the truth."
name: Real Talk

description: Last name Colors, First name Water.
name: Drake & Watercolors

description: You know what's even better than free food? Picking locks. Fortunately, we won't make you choose between them. Come pick your way through locks and eat through bagels, or vice versa depending on the quality of your dentist. No experience required!
name: Bagels and Locks

description: Can you knot?  Here's your chance to learn!  A practical introduction to the art, mathematics, and philosophy of tying people up.  Come learn how to put the Reidemeister moves on your friends.
name: Applied Knot Theory

description: "Are you a chip off the ice block, or a lychee that fell far from the tree? Does this have any relevance? Only the ice and lychees (They aren't part of the actual phrases you say? Shhh). Here you'll find a delicious treat to satisfy your sweet tooth - shaved ice topped with yummy jellies and fruits galore!"
name: Shaved Ice Bar

description: What doesn’t taste good battered and fried? Come join us Nexties as we fry Oreos, vegetables, candy, and whatever leftovers we have from REX! Your imagination is the limit!
name: Fire & Ice Part 2

description: How long can Burton 2 last before this devolves into a Disney sing-a-long? Come and sing for yourself.
name: B2 Karaoke!

description: Who doesn't love breakfast for dinner, or maybe even a midnight snack?
name: Waffle Bar

description: "Nail painting, face masks, junk food, and chick flicks--the classic sleepover"
name: Simmons Sleepover Soirée

description: Jenga, the fun way!  Try not to knock over the tower as you become more and more entangled!  Cooperation is the key to victory in this delicate game of balance!
name: Bondage Jenga

description: "See next event for a hint to the pun."
notes_to_dormcon: Please put this event right before Rainbow Pancake Breakfast in the booklet!
name: A Bearry Berry Breakfast

description: We will have breakfast food. Enough said.
name: Breakfast

description: "We know you're hungry for more information about what queer life is like at MIT and Simmons. So come enjoy pancakes of different colors and conversations of different orientations."
name: Rainbow Pancake Breakfast

description: Get your fresh fruit!
name: McCormick Farmer's Market

description: "With the power of the Ancient Greek soldiers at our disposal, the Trojan Duck shall rise and form into an unstoppable, impenetrable, and unyielding machine of water of war with your help."
name: Trojan Duck Build

description: who said that grills implies burgers? grill your food. grill your friends. grill your enemies. salt provided (featuring vegetarian and dietary-restriction friendly food options)
name: Grill everything

description: "EAST THE DORM" Find a friendly cowboi tourguide in the courtyard for an East Campus dorm tour! Leaves approximately every half hour on 8/27 from 10 AM - 11 AM.
name: EC Dorm Tours

description: Boba Balls, Rice Balls, Beach Balls,meatballs....You name it, we have it. Come meet Conner 2 and play with some Balls!
name: Play With Balls Again!

description: Start your morning off the right way - with fresh homemade cookies & Burton Third's most industrious bakers.
name: Wake Up & Bake Cookies

description: Come have brunch and meet your dorm's Head of House!
name: Head of House Brunch

description: Hair is temporary, bleach is permanent, instagam likes are forever.
name: Brand Yourself (hair dye/henna)

description: "Play party games and snack on sushi with the gents of G-Entry! Roll your own (no experience required) and play some Drawful and Sushi Go! Bring a charged smart device of some kind."
name: Sushi Party!

description: "Dr. Carber has been murdered! Help the 15th Simmons Police Force (SPF 15) investigate the evidence surrounding his demise!"
name: Murder Mystery

description: "Objectively the best use of any pool table- a fast-paced billiards game that is a long-standing Simmons tradition!"
name: Gatas

description: "Bubble wrap, a ball pit, and boba. The three B's for a stress-free semester."
name: Bubble Break

description: Out in the west, nothing can stop fights from breaking out. All we can do is hope that our rivals don't plan as far ahead...
name: Human-Sized Chess

description: Come barter for some yummy Trader Joe's snacks from your local Trader Jack! Free in exchange for an answer to a completely normal, noninvasive question.
name: Trader Jack's

description: Charmin' Ultrasoft. Less is More.
name: Toilet Paper Dodgeball

description: Come play ping pong with us and eat some spherical shaped fruit!
name: Boba and Other Balls

description: Wrestling...... in Jello
name: Jello Wrestling

description: Grab some wings and do some things. (Activities include board cards, card games, SMASH!)
name: 2E: Wings and Things

description: Come chill and unwind before the math diagnostic. (If you don't have to take it, feel free to stick around and sort the ballpit with us.)
notes_to_dormcon: If it's not okay to have this event officially run into the math diagnostic timeslot, then cut it off at the appropriate time and change the description to "Come chill and unwind before the math diagnostic. (If you don't have to take it, feel free to stick around and sort the ballpit with us.)"
name: Chill in Ballpit

description: Take a tour of the castle with a Maseeh resident as your guide! Leaves every 10 minutes.
name: Maseeh Tours

description: "Lettuce give you the only fruits and veggies you might find all REX while you attempt to beet our residents to fig-ure out the answers. It’s sure to be a-maize-ing; please bring laptops if possible!"
name: Protobowl and Produce

description: ""We're all mad here [at MIT]. I'm mad. You're mad." Come to our mad tea party with our mad good scones and mini sandwiches and our mad hot tea, both caffinated and herbal!"
name: Tea Party

description: Simmons has scootahs from scootah hockey, plastic balls from the ball pit, and a couple of baskets. Do you have what it takes to win?
name: Hungry Hungry Hippos IRL.

description: "9 Houses enter, only one will be crowned champion! Come meet our 9 cooking communities and judge the treats they made just for you!"
name: New House Bakeoff

description: "We have a kiddie pool and several gallons of maple syrup. Help us pour it on our friend Aiyedun. (We're saving some syrup to go with all the pancakes we made, but most of it is for Aiyedun) "
name: IHOA (International House of Aiyedun)

description: "Looking for an event where you can get FREE FOOD but also meet and mingle with AWESOME PEOPLE? Then look no further! Come out to La Casa's block party for food, music, and fun! If you don't know us, come get to know us, and if you do, you know it'll be good."
name: La Casa Block Party

description: gather cruft. break things.
name: Cruft Smashing

description: Good morning! yep (breakfast) grills are still hot eom
name: Breakfast all day at the gri(ll)dles

description: Come join the Next Football Club for a game of pickup soccer! Only then, here and now, will you understand why soccer is a way of life. (All skill levels welcome. Feel free to join at any time.)
name: Next Football Club: Pick Up Game

description: Spray paint our ping pong board and make some smores!
name: Spraypainting and Smores

description: Both the dance and the dip.
name: Salsa With Salsa

description: Learn how to do skateboard tricks!
name: Skate and Tape a Mate

description: "A water war is approaching. Come paint your defenses."
name: Shield Painting

description: Do you refuse on principle to make peace with 'The Man'? Participate in EAsT camPUS's history of harmless yet unbounded angst by making impromptu speeches and picket signs in protest of the lack of grass in the EC Courtyard, the undeserved reputation of satanist cults, and the fluctuating price of eggs. Additional riot topics will be audience's choice. Everyone is welcome to attend this warm EC introduction to the land of freedom of speech, creativity, and *redacted*.
name: RIOT!!!

description: "EVERYTHING is bigger in Simmons. Giant BALL PITS. Giant LEGOS. Giant JENGA. Giant ORIGAMI (try it with your feet!). Giant TWISTER. Giant CONNECT FOUR. Giant CARDS. Giant BOWLING. mini food."
name: Giant Stuff with Mini Food

description: "Play games and drink tea from our extensive collections. No promises that you'll win, however. "
name: Board Games and Tea

description: Why play regular Pictionary when you could be drawing things like MechaHitler, being on fire, a middle aged man on roller skates, raptor attacks, children on leashes, or chainsaws for hands? A hilarious mix of Cards Against Humanity and Pictionary! Shenanigans will ensue.
name: Cards Against Humanity Pictionary

description: Come eat snacks and make cat toys for the wonderful cats of Loop!
name: Crazy Cat Lady Make-a-thon

description: "bang.. a shOt goes off in a Crowded room and a man falls down, dead. you have Two hoUrs to Solve our puzzlEs and find the murdeRer. bring YoUr appetite for justIce (and catered dinner). note: no team in the history of j entry murder mystery has solved all of our puzzles -- it's still a good time :)"
name: "The Original (J Entry Murder) Mystery, est. 2015"

description: "Get "locked" in a room with some of your soon-to-be closest friends! Can you complete all the puzzles before the velociraptors break in?"
name: Escape the Room

description: "It's an Wii tournament like no other at MIT! Make new friends. Destroy your rivals. Come for the glory and come for the food!"
name: Wii Tournament

description: "Tired after a long day of orientation events? Don't really feel like going out and about anymore? Come home to La Casa and order some takeout with us! We'll be just as tired as you."
name: Tired & Takeout

description: Petting zoo...bouncy castles...cotton candy...it’ll be a summer night to remember!
name: Night Carnival

description: Decorate a plant pot and adopt your own baby succulent plant to bring some life and wholesomeness to your new home-away-from-home dorm room. According to the sacred science of the Native Upperclassmans, plants can cure even the worst of Institvte Wh-itus syndrome.
name: Pot(ting) Plants

description: A Maseeh tradition with a little extra something this year!
name: S'mores + 2048

description: "Eat good cheese, drink tasty teas, converse with ease, feel warm fuzzies, admire the seas, hug the trees, enjoy the breeze, try not to sneeze. Oh Jeez."
name: Soirée de Cheese and Teas

description: 1v1 on call of duty modern warfare 2. quickscopes only. hilarity ensues.
name: 1-v-1 Quickscopes Only

description: Python3 programming competition
name: Next Code: Python Bee

description: Show tunes and snacks! Fun and fruit! Carols and cookies! Come hang out and share our love for all things musical.
name: Next Act: Disney Karaoke

description: Truth+Dare-Truth+Dares+Beanbags-Dignity = ? .....Come and find out!
name: Fear Factor

description: Shots! Shots! Shots! Shots! ...Of desserts.
name: Dessert Shots

description: Fiasco is an improv-based roleplaying game, where characters are created based on their relationships to other characters, and everything inevitably goes disastrously!  No experience with roleplaying games necessary - Fiasco is pretty easy to learn!
name: Fiasco

description: Tournament style with prizes. Will you win, or will you get Kirbicided?
name: Smash!

description: "Come hang with the chillest residents this side of the Charles River! Food, fun, and friends provided."
name: Chill with C-Entry

description: "It don' mean a thing if it ain' got that swing! Come learn basic lindy hop in this intro lesson, then stay afterwards for TOTS to show off your moves! No partner or prior experience necessary."
name: Swing Dancing

description: "A puzzle hunt made by MIT students, for MIT students. Drop in at any time and solve a few puzzles, or try to solve the meta first. "
name: Puzzle Hunt!

description: "Enjoy a cool Monday night in with DH! There will be popcorn!"
name: Movie Night!!

description: As in music, not the sugary substance that goes with peanut butter. You bring your songs, covers, and jamz, we'll bring the keyboard, guitars, and drums.
name: Jam Session

description: games and snacks and snacks and games
name: Board Games Night

description: Have you ever played Mario Kart with a Guitar Hero Controller? Driven your way through Rainbow Road on a DDR mat? Cruised across the finish line using bananas and apples as your steering wheel? No? Well, why the heck not?
name: 4E: Mario Kart with Inappropriate Controllers

description: Learn how to braid challah with the Jewish and non-Jewish community on Burton 2!
name: Challah Baking with B2

description: Cause we all know being the big stack is the best way to make friends. Texas Hold'em with prizes. No real money will be exchanged.
name: Poker Night

description: Come work on cardio, core, and pole fitness
name: Reverse Fireman

description: "Do you already oh-so-miss your fried chicken options from back home? Do you want to talk with upperclassmen about what is wisdom, the meaning of 1+1, or what interesting things happen can happen on what otherwise would've been a typical day of a MIT student? Why is this "of Cain"? Well then, you better not miss out on this event. F-Entry formally presents the chicken we oh-so-adore, from a place where it alone is exclusively loved."
name: Fantastic Cane's of Cain

description: Are you ready for your presentation? What do you mean "what presentation"? Yes, right now! What, you've never seen these slides before? No problem! Powerpoint Karaoke: we've got random slides you've never seen before, and it's your turn to present!
name: Powerpoint Karaoke

description:
"Come and enjoy the presence of the one and only amazing Bentry family. Take part in the festivities of questionable origin stories, random unplanned cooking of random stuff, spontaneous arts and crafts, and overall relaxing fun.
Disclaimer: may evolve into no chill with B entry depending on the atmosphere."
name: B chill with B entry

description: "Come dance the night away on our iconic rooftop terrace with a spectacular view of the Boston skyline! It’ll be dope as duck."
name: Top of the Sponge

description: "we provide: pancake batter, heat, food coloring. you provide: imagination, creativity, cooking expertise. no cooking knowledge required, appetites encouraged"
name: Pancake Art

description: "This isn't your average everyday darkness. This is... Advanced darkness. Not to fear! We've provided you with glow sticks and UV lights to aid you as you run around and try to hunt down the infamous food thief!"
name: Glow in the Dark Scavenger Hunt

description: Come take part in Conner 3's butt scooter challenge! There will be brownies at the finish line.
name: Butt Scooters and Brownies

description: We're not belgian but we know how to make waffles. Come eat all the waffles and toppings you've ever dreamed of!
name: Belgian Waffles

description: Come join us in not-being-here.
name: where'd we go?

description: Do you like making things and also a have hankering for Italian foods? Come join the citizens of Next to make some quality pizza and drink some Italian soda!
name: Make Your Own Pizza & Italian Soda

description: No experience required, just a strong desire to try painting! Make your own masterpiece with the Toucans of Burton 2.
name: B2 Paint Bar

description: PANCAKES PANCAKES PANCAKES PANCAKES PANCAKES
name: Random House of Pancakes

description: "What do you call a berry that tests your patience? The last strawberry. But don't worry, we'll have plenty!"
name: A Berry Fancy Breakfast

description: Come join the Baker residents for waffles and lawn games! Chat with your fellow first years while enjoying the beautiful view of the Charles River. Eat some delicious homemade waffles with tons of tasty toppings and wake up to some bumpin' tunes! Join us on the Memorial Drive back lawn of Baker for a great morning!
name: Baker Waffles by the River

description: "We will have breakfast food. Enough said."
name: Breakfast

description: "There are pancake eaters, pancake afficionados, and pancake lovers. Where do you fall on the pancake spectrum?"
name: Pancake Breakfast

description: Wow, you’re now on day 3 of orientation! Stressed out yet? Kind of? Sort of? Home sick? Already exhausted by those mandatory OL events? Worried about classes starting next week? Whatever your worries are, we’ve got quite the treat for you! Did someone say Union Square Donuts?
name: *DONUT* PANIC!

description: Healthy fruits for a healthy body; challenging puzzles to rev up your brain for the rest of the day.
name: Puzzles & Fruits

description: "Hours remain before the war of our lifetime. The war to end all water wars (until REX 2019). We need your help to finalize and fix the Trojan Duck. Come join us for the water war tonight!"
name: Trojan Duck Build

description: "Join The Breakfast Club! Lol jk, we're not like that, but breakfast is the most important meal of the day, and what better way is there to start the day than with the awesome people of House 2?"
name: Breakfast with House 2

description: Can we go for three? We can! Come and eat with us!
name: Waffle Bar

description: "Settle in Catan, make up some Codenames, create a Monopoly, or get a Clue! Join us for brunch and enjoy some boardgames while you're at it."
name: Brunch and Boardgames

description: grilling all day everyday (seriously, we can't finish all of these burgers ourselves).
name: grilling

description: Warning: Wild student-humans in their natural habitat - Do not feed! Find a friendly cowboi tourguide in the courtyard for an East Campus dorm tour! Leaves approximately every half hour on 8/28 from 10 AM - 12 PM.
name: EC Dorm Tours

description: We make tea and tacos and enjoy them.
name: Tortilla Time and Tea

description: experience the englightenment of crossing a bridge to ??, chill in our saloon fort, and ride our kinetic structures.
name: frolicking in the courtyard

description: What better way to appreciate the Old West spirit of individualism and self-reliance than to get your hair dyed in ALL OF THE COLORS because you can and why not
name: Brand Yourself (hair dye/henna)

description: Only upperclassmen allowed in the Party Room. But you can walk upstairs like you already live here, leave your bag in the hall, don't knock, and the secret password is "Cake?".
name: Upperclassmen Only Event and Sneak Into Upperclassmen Only Event

description: Saddle up your broncos and get ready to beat the clock! Bring your competitive drive to race our super light, indestructible FPV quadcopter drones over crazy obstacles. You'll be scored on control, length of tricks, and how hard your 'copter bucks, with penalties for touches. We'll be providing the ropes and baskets - you'll be providing saddle-wrangling cowboy spirit. Yee haw!
location: Building W34, 2nd floor Johnson Hockey Rink, DAPER
notes_to_dormcon: Pending CAC approval of location reservation
name: Quadcopter Rodeo

description: Need a way to relieve some stress? Want to unleash your inner destructive spirit? Come use sledgehammers and smash your problems into submission.
name: Smash Shit

description: Come join the Random faction as we prepare to march to victory at the water wars! Cover yourself in war­paint! Prepare flying aqueous projectiles! Create funnelators of doom and deathiness! Unleash your inner berserker!
name: DESTROY YOUR ENEMIES WITH FIERCE BLASTS OF DIHYDROGEN MONOXIDE

description: Learn the art of stone knapping (make stone tools using other stones) and make your own stone tool to take! No trip to the Old Wild West would be complete without a custom arrowhead souvenier!
name: Make your own Stone Tool

description: The real question is, what’re THOSE? Find a friendly cowboi tourguide in the courtyard for an East Campus dorm tour! Leaves approximately every half hour on 8/28 from 3 PM - 5 PM.
name: EC Dorm Tours

description: Go to your assigned advisors and register your classes for the fall semester!
name: Advisor Meetings

description: "Like asian snacks? Like board games? Come to DH to munch on some yummy asian snacks while playing board games! (There may be boba)"
name: Boba and Asian Snacks

description: Come help us prepare for our imminent battle against West Campus! Remember: East Campus ALWAYS wins the water war.
name: Water War Prep

description: "Enjoy some homemade bubble tea while playing all kinds of video games"
name: Boba Arcade

description: East vs. West ­ it is time to honor your dorm through the use of colorful, water filled projectiles.
name: Water War

description: You can tell its a duck because of the way it is.
name: Feed Ducks with Us

description: Have you always wanted a more well rounded perception of the Harry Potter universe? No? In that case, join us as we read poorly written fan fics!
name: Harry Potter Erotic Fan Fiction

description: "It's exactly what it sounds like. Not everything at MIT needs to be difficult. Join House 2 and make delicious aesthetically pleasing sweets!"
name: Cake Decorating

description: Drop by 4W, also known as The Shire, to play all sorts of games! There’ll be card games, board games like Sushi Go, Smash, and snacks. Come hang out with us!
name: 4W: Shire Smash, Spades, and Sushi Go

description: It's party tome across the entire castle! Every floor has its own theme!
name: Tower Party

description: "Whether it's a means of getting vegetables to the other side of the Charles River (goo.gl/er2CPS), a 80 PSI tampon launcher (goo.gl/QmpJqr), or a giant HEX logo (goo.gl/Eq51Hy), any project is welcome at HEX. With more powertools than you can possibly ever need, any project is possible. Tonight, we’ll be experimenting with falling objects, building contraptions that can launch 90kg projectiles over 300 meters."
name: [Falling Objects Hazard] Makeathon!

description: "Your presentation's due in 15 MINUTES, so, naturally, you throw together random pictures on a PowerPoint and then present your work to a room full of people. Experience PowerPoint Karaoke, which requires presenters to think on their feet as they give a presentation they've never seen before."
name: PowerPoint Karaoke

description: Melted chocolate and plenty of fruit and sweets to dip, what's not to like? Come check out the Boston skyline from our penthouse at our famous fondue night!
name: Fondue Night

description: Enjoy homegrown music in our saloon Fort Fred. You bring your songs, covers, and jamz, we'll bring the keyboard, guitars, drums, and the rodeo.
name: Smol Desk Concert

description: Is it street football if it’s not in the street? Come find out in Lobby 13 and play football with the Next Football Club!
name: Next Football Club: Street Football

description: Watch and debrief Beyonce's art and music videos while snacking like a queen.
name: BeyFive

description: Will it blend? Yes. Will it taste good? Uhhhhhhh
name: Guess The Smoothie

description: Have you ever seen 3333rd chocolate chip cookies? Come join the Burton Third Bombers in some decent conversation and enjoy delicious homemade ice cream sandwiches. Hurry! We only have 3333rd cookies.
name: The Talk

description: Make dumplings with Randomites! We’ll teach you if you don’t know how to. Vegetarian options available.
name: Dumplings

description: Build a Dominion in Puerto Rico comprised of Seven Wonders, then Race to the Galaxy and help the Twilight Imperium crush the Resistance. Through the Ages, board games have been an Innovation Random Hall has enjoyed. Come and play the various board games we've acquired!
name: Pecker Board Game Night

description: "Got any questions about the MIT experience or life in general? Drop by C-Entry for quality conversation and snacks!"
name: Converse with C-Entry

description: "Did you know that everything is actually some form of dumpling? Really, think about it. Come bask in the glory that is the dumpling. We have a whole batch waiting to be eaten by you! Vegetarian options available."
name: Dumpling Party

description: "planned impromptu movie with too much popcorn. what's not to love?!"
name: Movie in Lounge eom

description: Ah, there you are. Excellent, I thought you had missed my letter. Tonight, come and enter my museum and see my personal collection of puzzles. But beware, for only the bravest of you will be able to escape the room of... The Museum of Frightening Adventures! Come alone or with friends. Early or late. I look forward to making your acquaintance - The Curator
name: Next Haunt: The MFA

description: Bring your favorite Cards against Humanity to life. Pooping back and forth forever? 10,000 volts straight to the nipples? Anything is possible.
name: Charades Against Humanity with Oreo Balls

description: Channel your inner Picasso, or potato while making potato stamps.
name: Ahhhhrt

description: We're all queer here! Come join the ladies of Loop to watch cheesy queer movies (happy ending guaranteed) and decorate pride flag cookies. People of all genders and sexualities welcome.
name: Queer Ladies' Movie Night

description: Tea: still a very delicious beverage. Thi: again, still a very delicious man. Come experience the dawn of age of return of tea time with Thi 2.
name: Tea time with Thi: Resurrection

description: "Roll around the erupting Mount Simmons in chairs. Move from lounge to lounge without touching the floor and boucing off the walls. Velociraptor repelent not provided."
name: Floor is Lava

description: Come party at the social dorm with the fun residents of Baker and your fellow first years! Join us for lit music, delish pizza, and an overall good time! Get HYPED for the largest party of REX! You might even be able to finesse yourself some Baker swag! Don’t miss out on this iconic event!
name: Baker Skyline

description: "E entry’s legendary bean dip along with its legendary board game fanatics all in one place. Catan you believe it?"
name: bEan dip and board games

description: "Play Recollection! Challenge our resident Set master! Meet some of your new classmates through friendly competition! There will be more boardgames and ice cream than you've ever seen."
name: Board Games and Ice Cream

description: "There are lots of foods you can order late at night in a college town. Pizza, burritos, frozen yogurt...the list goes on. But there is only one truly delicious edible thing that will make your stomach sing at 11 pm: boba tea."
name: DIY Boba Bar

description: Howdy yall! Looking for some good ol' home-cooked food in this food desert that is gentrified Cambridge? Swing by Pinkie's, EC's diner in Talbot Lounge, to meet upperclassmen and eat classics like Harry's Monstrosity brownie-grilled cheese. For futures Pinkie's announcements, add yourself to not-maseeh-dining@mit.edu.
name: Pinkies

description: Join us in 2W for some games, snacks, and fun company...and maybe some music.  What are you waiting for?
name: 2W: Game Night (with snacks!)

description: "Come join QueerWest and GFG for Simmons' Queer night! We'll talk, watch a gay show/movie, and relax with one another."
name: Here and Queer

description: "moshimoshi!" come get fed by maids with cat ears! "ichiban no kawaii neko maid cafe desu!" (=^-.-^=)/ "nyaaaa~"
name: Nekomimi Maid Cafe

description: Come watch Smoke Signals, an indie movie and the first full-length movie written, directed, co-produced and performed by Native Americans.
name: Smoke Signals (Film)

description: Couldn’t get enough midnight pancakes and s’mores the other night? Come to a special second round of one of Next House’s most popular REX events [citation needed]. Starts right after the housing lottery!
name: Midnight Pancakes & Smores Part 2: Electric Boogaloo

description: It's midnight, the nearby supermarket is closed (forever), but you're hungry. Let's make a three course meal using only stuff bought from the gas station.
name: Midnight Chef

description: "Feel like you're getting berried alive with all the events going on? Let's do it!"
name: A Berry Fancy Breakfast

description: N THE RUN FROM THE BREAKFAST POLICE! Morning workout anyone? Go for a jog around a bridge loop led by McCormick residents. Whatever your pace-- morning workout or a scenic jog, we'll have a group for you! Meet in the lobby, leaving by 7:10 am.
name: Morning Run

description: "We will have breakfast food. Enough said."
name: Breakfast

description: "The PENULTIMATE PANCAKE PARTY! BE THERE OR BE WAFFLE!"
name: Pancake Breakfast

description: What goes with maple syrup? Hint: It’s not burgers.
name: iHOM: International House of Maple [Syrup]

description: Kick it back elementary school style with some cartoons and breakfast cereal.
name: Straight Up Breakfast Cereal & Cartoons

description: Enjoy your favorite childhood cereals and cartoons!
name: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cartoons

description: According to our patented ML algorithm, there's a 100% chance grills are hot eom again today
name: grillgrillgrillz

description: Still hungry after breakfast? Come devour some pancakes, eggs, and sausages with Conner 2!
name: Second Breakfast

description: "Come see real Homestuck characters, drink faygo, eat slime pie. If you don't know what this event is referencing, look it up."
name: Homestuck Party

description: Come make your own poi or staff! Spinning is a fun thing that some people like to do! You can do it too! We will have limited supplies.
name: Make your own Fire Spinning Prop

description: We've been coloring hair so long that our hands have literally turned into rainbows. Please advise.
name: Brand Yourself (hair dye/henna)

description: "A legen-dairy event sure to leave you with fondue memories. Come feast your eyes (and mouth) on brie-licious dairy products and accompanying foods."
name: Cheese Party

description: "MIT's a freaking fracking complicated place! Come chill, talk, and make froyo with New Housers where we'll make you forget all about Orientation!"
name: iDontKnowWhatToDoThereAreTooManyPeopleIHaveSoManyPamphlets I just want froyo

description: What is it? Who knows.
name: Strange Meats

description: "Who said waffles were only a breakfast food? Join House 2 in one of our most beloved traditions and enjoy waffles, fresh fruit, and Nutella to your heart's content."
name: Waffle Wednesday

description: Gather in your dorm to participate in this important process! Every building does this differently, so make sure you are there on time.
name: In­-house rooming processes begin

description: REX is exhausting. Get some rest and catch a good movie while you're at it!
name: Movie Night

description: lo fi hip hop beats to question reality/society/the entirety of human knowledge to
name: Lo Fi Hip Hop & Philosophy

description: Hate how the DJ always monopolizes the dance music at a party? Well now, you have the choice between different songs, and can still dance with all your friends. Come join McCormick in a one of a kind neon headphone party! We'll have 3-channel headphones and tons of glow-in-the-darks for you!!!
name: Neon Headphone Party

description: BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS & BACON STRIPS
name: Epic Mealtime of Destiny

description: Remember your childhood and come watch some Disney movies. Sing along, eat popcorn and chill.
name: Disney Night

description: Now it's time to move into your new room for this semester! Make sure this is the first thing on your list!
name: MOVING DAY

description: You know that list of 101 things they give you at the check-in for orientation? Well guess what? You can check one of them off! Meet in McCormick Lobby by 5:30 AM to head out onto the *Mass Ave* Bridge.
name: Sunrise On The Harvard Bridge

description: "We will have breakfast food. Enough said."
name: Breakfast

description: Some of you might be saying. "Another pancake breakfast?" To which I respond, "YAY! ANOTHER PANCAKE BREAKFAST!"
name: Pancake Breakfast

description: Need a solid W to end the week after taking all those ASEs and placement exams? Join us at McCormick for the biggest W of all: waffles!
name: McCormick Breakfast House

description: Ever had a turkey and chocolate syrup sandwich? Me neither, but come try it anyway! Who knows, you might love your newest creation!
name: Experimental Sandwiches

description: Come and explore interesting ideas in physics and learn what MIT has to offer. (One thing MIT offers is free soda.)
name: Physics and Fizzes

description: “What's the best part of MIT?” Sure, we have great academics and fun activities, but hands down the food! Try a variety of foods from local restaurants. We'll have Indian, Italian, Chinese, and more!
name: Taste of Cambridge

description: Life isn't just about technicals - HASS classes are the best classes. Meet some real-life humanities majors and minors (we do exist). Munch on some avocado toast and learn about MIT's cool humanities classes!
name: HASS and Toast

description: Did you know Random Hall has a roofdeck garden? Well, it doesn't - yet. But it will in four hours! Help us plant the inaugural Random garden (gloves/trowels/etc. provided)
name: Plant the Random Hall Garden!

description: Quick! Tell us a story involving being a motherf*cking sorcerer, racially biased SAT questions, and...bees?
name: Milk and Cookies Storytime Against Humanity

description: It’s blue! No it’s orange! No it’s red! Join us for a party so colorful you’ll think it’s a *pigment* of your imagination! We’ll be starting at 4 pm sharp so be there! And be sure to wear your white swim test t-shirts (keep in mind that while color is said to be washable, some staining may occur)!!! While we will provide a limited amount of sunglasses, bring a pair if you have some! While supplies last.
name: Color War

description: Grab your favorite pot and satisfy your munchies on Clam. We've got the brownies, the hash (browns) and more! (No drugs, just good food and bad puns.)
name: Clam Bake

description: Like football but not enough to play it in real life? Come play in the Next Football Club FIFA Tournament!
name: Next Football Club: FIFA Tournament

description: Eat complimentary slices of meat and cheese while deciphering our curated video exhibits of experimental performative social interventions. Previously entitled "trashy memes with Luis" but now with unironic performance art.
name: Contemporary "Art" and Charcuterie

description: Become better acquainted with your Head of House and your house team!
name: Head of House Meeting

description: Come eat a mountain of food with Conner 2! We will be serving at least 20kg of rice, beans, and chicken.
name: Mountains of Food

description: Make :sushi: with us
name: :sushi:

description: Arm yourself with a weapon wrought of foam and tape, and strike with the fury of a thousand tigers! FOR THE GLORY OF RANDOM HALL!
name: Boffing on the Roofdeck

description: Can't resist singing the intro and ending themes every time you watch anime?  Don't even know the words?  No problem!  Come sing your favorite anime songs and show the world your ability!
name: Anime Karaoke

description: Does the stress of REX make you a mess? It’s time to forget all that by eating some homemade spaghetti! Come join Bonfire for various spaghetti and music!
name: Spaghetti to Forgetti

description: Come sing with us! Broadway, Disney, Pokémon, Dr. Horrible, songs about science, and more!
name: Nerdy Sing-Along

description: Black Hole's cats are gone. Graduated, the rumors say. The halls are empty, devoid of plaintive wails for the first time in living memory. Only we can bring them back. When the sky grows dark and the border between worlds weakens, you will know that the time for action has arrived. Together, we shall pierce the veil. We shall chase the fleeting past and snatch at hints of the future, until we know the truth or have transcended truth altogether. Cloaks and pentagrams will be provided. As for cats, it's up to us.
name: Feline Summoning Ritual

description: It’s a buffet.
name: Leftovers Time.

description: Searching for that Boston aesthetic? Want a unique souvenir to take home with you? Join us in the east penthouse for the best skyline view on campus! And maybe paint a canvas or two.
name: Paint The Skyline

description: Lauren keeps buying weird and/or fancy teas. Too many teas. Please help us get rid of them. There will also be scones.
name: Tea Party Extravaganza

description: Cool down with ice cream from the best in Cambridge : Tosci’s!
name: I Scream, You Scream, We All Scream

description: I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream! Served steaming cold.
name: LN2 Ice Cream

description: Wield cans of whipped cream and make the best (?) art (?) of your life. And then eat it, if you want.
name: Whipped Cream Sculptures

description: Go to a real MIT student's room and cover that person's wall with whatever you want.
name: Paint Someone's Room

description: Come hang with the entire Irish undergraduate community at MIT and potato (<- verb). We will eat potatoes, paint with potatoes and decorate potatoes.
name: Potatoes and Potato Art

description: There’s nothing quite like enjoying a warm summer night with an outdoor movie! Come through for a Boston classic, featuring Matt Damon, OUR FAVORITE JANITOR AT MIT. We promise great snacks and even better company!
name: Movie Under The Cambridge Sky

description: Start college right by watching The Office on Clam.
name: Office Hours on Clam

description: Too lazy/busy to cook for real? Learn how to make a wide range of meals in under 15 minutes!
name: Easy Meals Under 15 Minutes
